availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Benjamin Davis Peek (Caldwell County Lyon County laborer and farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County and Lyon County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas W. Peek and Frances Peek. Married to Adeline Douglass Peek in Jessamine County, Kentucky, on January 14, 1856. Father of Letitia Peek, George S. Peek, and Thomas J. Peek. Student and laborer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 307B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 691.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994042, Jessamine County Marriages.
"Benjamin Davis Peek (1836-1901)," Find A Grave, Memorial #18628026, accessed September 8, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/18628026.
